# archestra_team_external_group (Resource)

Manages a mapping between an Archestra team and an external identity provider group.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `team_id` (String) The ID of the Archestra team.

### Optional

- `external_group_id` (String) The external group ID (e.g., LDAP DN).
- `external_group_name` (String) The external group name (for OIDC/SAML providers).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier in format team_id/mapping_id
